message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $14,000. I believe it will be a valuable asset for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I'm interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $11,500 is significantly below its value.  I could consider letting it go for $13,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $12,200? I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.
